items.title: Learn to draw fashion with Adobe Illustrator CC - Beginners

visible_instructors.title: Jo Hughes
visible_instructors.name: Jo
visible_instructors.job_title: Fashion and Retail Software Solutions Expert

items.headline: Illustrator training specifically tailored for fashion designers
objectives_summary: You will have a good foundation in drawing fashion flats
You will be well on your way to becoming a fashion designer with expert skills in Adobe Illustrator.
You will be ready to progress to the intermediate and advanced training with the details and links to these additional online courses provided in the course summary.

items.title: Sketching for Fashion Design -- Beginner Course

visible_instructors.title: Nino Via
visible_instructors.name: Nino
visible_instructors.job_title: Fashion Design Instructor - Expert Fashion Consultant/Coach

items.headline: Learn how to sketch your fashion ideas. A step-by-step course on how professionals do it.
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to sketch a "9-heads croqui".
They will learn movement of the body, balance, plumb line.
They will learn pencil techniques in order to create shirring/gathers, and shading, and the use of color pencils.

items.title: Introduction: Make and Sell Custom Shirts w/ Merch by Amazon
items.headline: Merch by Amazon allows anyone with a computer to offer their designs for sale on Amazon as print on demand shirts.
objectives_summary: Create a Merch by Amazon account
Understand the digital file requirements for shirt designs
Use the Merch by Amazon platform to create their own shirt designs available for sale on Amazon

items.title: Pattern Making for Fashion Design - Beginner Course (Part 1)

visible_instructors.title: Nino Via
visible_instructors.name: Nino
visible_instructors.job_title: Fashion Design Instructor - Expert Fashion Consultant/Coach

items.headline: How to use Pattern Making Principals and Techniques to draft patterns for your original fashion design ideas.
objectives_summary: PATTERN  MAKING for Fashion Designers. This is a beginner course on how to draft patterns, and some draping.
Students will learn the Principals of Pattern Drafting (Dart Manipulation, Added Fullness, Contour).
Students will learn Techniques such as Pivoting and Slash-and-Spread.

items.title: Basic Fashion Illustration
items.headline: From a 4-month course to a 2-hour video. Learn the simple techniques of how to draw fashion figures and postures.
objectives_summary: Over 15 lectures and almost 2 hours of content!
This course will cover the basic of fashion illustration for a beginner to an intermediate.
You will be equipped with the knowledge and techniques of how to draw the body elements and different fashion poses.

items.title: Pattern Cutting & Making for Absolute Beginners - Fashion

visible_instructors.title: Caroline Barulis - Pure Pattern Cutting
visible_instructors.name: Caroline Barulis -
visible_instructors.job_title: Pattern Cutter & Maker - Luxury Fashion Design

items.headline: The ultimate video series for learning basic pattern cutting/making. WE DON'T COVER BLOCK CREATION
objectives_summary: Learn the tools of the trade
Basic measurements & measuring
Dart manipulation

items.title: How To Create A Fashion Collection and Launch Your Own Brand

visible_instructors.title: Nino Via
visible_instructors.name: Nino
visible_instructors.job_title: Fashion Design Instructor - Expert Fashion Consultant/Coach

items.headline: A step-by-step 8-video series with all the necessary elements to start a fashion Brand -- development and launching.
objectives_summary: Students will have learned all the necessary steps, tools, process, etc. in order to create a fashion collection and a brand.
From Concept to Completion - From ideas, to sketching, to draping, to pattern drafting, Cost sheets, Teck Packs, etc.
Students will learn about Social Medial and how to use it to maximize sales and elevate your company to global visibility.

items.title: Photoshop For T-shirt Design: For Beginners

visible_instructors.title: Gary Ajene
visible_instructors.name: Gary
visible_instructors.job_title: Founder of T-shirt Help Desk, Guru & Web Marketer..

items.headline: Learn how to use Photoshop to create awesome, Hot Selling T-shirts
objectives_summary: At the end of my course you will be able to use photoshop effectively and create awesome T-shirt designs

items.title: Become a fashion buyer - learn the essentials
items.headline: Learn the essential tasks of a fashion buyer and skills required to secure your first role!
objectives_summary: Know the role of a fashion buyer
Know the skills required to succeed as a fashion buyer
The confidence to embark on a career as a fashion buyer

objectives_summary: Competently produce detailed coloured fashion flats
Create complex, resuable trim and stitch library components
You will be well on your way to becoming a fashion designer with expert skills in Adobe Illustrator

items.title: Look Your VERY best – Learn about Color, Style & Fashion

visible_instructors.title: Astrid Feichter
visible_instructors.name: Astrid
visible_instructors.job_title: Coach and Instructor for Color, Style + Image

items.headline: Create Your Unique Style – With YOUR Best Colors, Cuts, Lines, Prints and Accessories.
objectives_summary: Discover what the right colors vs the wrong colors can do for you - with comprehensive background information about how and why it works, the history, the characteristics of each color type, etc.
Analyze your personal color season and choose the very best colors that will flatter your natural beauty
Learn all about the different shapes and determine which body type you tend towards to

items.title: Intro to Fashion Illustration
items.headline: How to Create Beautiful Fashion Sketches
objectives_summary: How to start a fashion illustration by drawing fashion proportions
Apply easy and fun exercises that will help you to create dynamic poses
Learn how to draw a face

items.title: Intro to Fashion Illustration -Beginners- Fashion Design
items.headline: Covering a range of drawing and design techniques, various materials, and tools to create finished fashion illustration!
objectives_summary: Platforms for research
How to use them and create reference mood board on Pinterest
Proportion of the body (for fashion illustration)

items.title: Draping for Fashion Design - Creative Techniques Made Simple

visible_instructors.title: Nino Via
visible_instructors.name: Nino
visible_instructors.job_title: Fashion Design Instructor - Expert Fashion Consultant/Coach

items.headline: Learning basic draping skills and techniques to develop your Fashion Design process.
objectives_summary: Draping for Fashion Design - basic skills and techniques in positioning and pinning fabric on a dress form to develop structure of a garment design -- to support and expand the fashion design process.

items.title: Learn Marvelous Designer
items.headline: Learn the basics of Marvelous Designer
objectives_summary: Learn the basics of Marvelous Designer
By the end of the course students will have a solid understanding of the Marvelous Designer interface and tools, and sculpting & modeling.

items.title: Fashion Design: Sketch in 3D using Marvelous Designer
items.headline: Turn your Fashion Drawing into a 3D Garment
objectives_summary: Edit Patterns
Sew Garments
Sew using the Free Hand Tool
